content:
Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions.
Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
When you specify time, always convert it to UTC
Current time is 20230925T134703Z.
Please let me know if there any event you want to add to your calendar
Please schedule a meeting with Tim Cook from 1pm pacific time for 30 minutes on July 4th, at his office, then, send the invitation to Tim (tim@apple.com).
Success. The invitation was sent to ['tim@apple.com']
name: send_invitation

content: I have scheduled a meeting with Tim Cook on July 4th at 8:00 PM UTC for 30 minutes. The meeting will be held at Apple Headquarters. I have sent the invitation to Tim Cook at tim@apple.com.
